Actions.Name: White Strings
Actions.Description: All demons and allied summons in the area can dash 2 spaces as an effect. All foes in the area are shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Black Strings
Actions.Description: A character in range 5 must save. On a failed save, they teleport up to 3 spaces to the nearest ally and deal light damage to them as an effect.

Actions.Name: Detonate Natal
Actions.Description: A natal in range 3 is destroyed, and explodes for a blast 1 explosion area effect. Characters in range must save or take light godly damage.
